text:
e="preserve">Samuel David Aston (born 7 June 1993) is an English actor, known for playing the role of Chesney Brown on the ITV soap opera, "Coronation Street". Aston made his television debut at the age of five, as an extra in "Eddie Mountain".
Aston was awarded Best Newcomer at the National Television Awards in 2004. He also won Best Dramatic Performance for a Young Actor or Actress at the British Soap Awards.
